post:
Hey LET,

At VPN.sh we're running a Black Friday special! It's now officially Friday in the UK (where we're based), so we're releasing this now!

You get access to all of our 18 locations, with the ability to use PPTP, L2TP and OpenVPN.

>**Our locations:**

>* 7x USA
>* 2x Netherlands
>* Australia
>* Canada
>* France
>* Germany
>* Japan
>* New Zealand
>* Sweden
>* Switzerland
>* UK

**[Order now for £1.50/year (roughly $2.40/year)](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=36)**

Available until: 00:00 GMT+1 02/12/2014

To view more information on the offer, **visit our [offer page](http://offer.vpn.sh)**.

Thanks!

>* Visit our [Website](http://vpn.sh)
>* Like us on [Facebook](http://facebook.com/vpndotsh)
>* Follow us on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/vpnsh)

_Note: Offer postings have been discussed with Maarten and there is no issue with us posting VPN offers. Currency conversion rate is correct as of 27th November 2014._
